db:abstract.db:para: Provides an API to access various serial bus devices.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Serial Bus API provides classes and functions to access the various industrial serial buses and protocols, such as CAN, ModBus, and others.

db:section.db:title: Getting Started

db:section.db:title: Logging Categories
db:section.db:para: The QtSerialBus module exports the following logging categories:

db:td.db:para: Enables standard logging inside the Qt CAN Bus classes

Enables low level logging inside the Qt CAN Bus plugin classes. To set logging for a specific plugin, use "qt.canbus.plugins.pluginname". e.g. "qt.canbus.plugins.socketcan". "qt.canbus.plugins*" affects all plugins.
Enables standard logging inside the Qt Modbus classes
Enables low level logging including individual packet content inside the Qt Modbus classes

db:section.db:para: Logging categories can be used to enable additional warning and debug output for QtSerialBus. More detailed information about logging can be found in QLoggingCategory.
